pokemon.name: rowlet
pokemon.dex: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

pokemon.name: dartrix
pokemon.dex: It throws sharp feathers called blade quills at enemies or prey. It seldom misses.

pokemon.name: decidueye
pokemon.dex: Although basically cool and cautious, when it's caught by surprise, it's seized by panic.

pokemon.name: litten
pokemon.dex: It doesn't allow its emotions to be easily seen. Earning its trust takes time. It prefers solitude.

pokemon.name: torracat
pokemon.dex: It boasts powerful front legs. With a single punch, it can bend an iron bar right over.

pokemon.name: incineroar
pokemon.dex: When its fighting spirit is set alight, the flames around its waist become especially intense.

pokemon.name: popplio
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon can control water bubbles. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big bubbles.

pokemon.name: brionne
pokemon.dex: It attacks by smacking its enemies with the exploding water balloons that it creates.

pokemon.name: primarina
pokemon.dex: Also known as a songstress, it has a fantastical look on moonlit nights when it leads its colony in song.

pokemon.name: pikipek
pokemon.dex: It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times per second!

pokemon.name: trumbeak
pokemon.dex: From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise to new plants.

pokemon.name: toucannon
pokemon.dex: Within its beak, its internal gas ignites, explosively launching seeds with enough power to pulverize boulders.

pokemon.name: yungoos
pokemon.dex: Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh living things, so it marches down streets in search of prey.

pokemon.name: gumshoos
pokemon.dex: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it's always snoozing by nightfall.

pokemon.name: grubbin
pokemon.dex: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.

pokemon.name: charjabug
pokemon.dex: Its stout shell provides excellent defense from attacks. It uses electricity on persistent opponents.

pokemon.name: vikavolt
pokemon.dex: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.

pokemon.name: crabrawler
pokemon.dex: It punches so much, its pincers often come off from overuse, but they grow back quickly. What little meat they contain is rich and delicious.

pokemon.name: crabominable
pokemon.dex: It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice to bits!

pokemon.name: oricorio
pokemon.dex: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

pokemon.name: cutiefly
pokemon.dex: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with Butterfree over food.

pokemon.name: ribombee
pokemon.dex: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.

pokemon.name: rockruff
pokemon.dex: It's considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

pokemon.name: lycanroc
pokemon.dex: The rocks in its mane are sharper than a knife. Fragments that break off are treasured as good luck charms.

pokemon.name: wishiwashi
pokemon.dex: When it's in a jam, its shining eyes attract others of its kind. The light from its eyes is visible almost 25 miles away.

pokemon.name: mareanie
pokemon.dex: It's found crawling on beaches and seafloors. The coral that grows on Corsola's head is as good as a five-star banquet to this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: toxapex
pokemon.dex: To attack, this Pokémon sends toxic spikes flying at its enemies. Ones that come close get mown down by the claws on its feet.

pokemon.name: mudbray
pokemon.dex: It has a stubborn, individualistic disposition. Eating dirt, making mud, and playing in the mire all form part of its daily routine.

pokemon.name: mudsdale
pokemon.dex: It can trudge mountain roads without rest for three days and three nights, all the while dragging a 10-ton load.

pokemon.name: dewpider
pokemon.dex: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.

pokemon.name: araquanid
pokemon.dex: It usually passes its time in the water. When its belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the water bubble on its head.

pokemon.name: fomantis
pokemon.dex: It loves the sunshine. When it basks in the sunlight regularly, it grows up with vivid coloration.

pokemon.name: lurantis
pokemon.dex: For self-protection, it pretends to be a bug Pokémon. Both of its arms bear keen-edged petals.

pokemon.name: morelull
pokemon.dex: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.

pokemon.name: shiinotic
pokemon.dex: When it starts fighting for territory with Parasect, the entire area gets completely coated in spores!

pokemon.name: salandit
pokemon.dex: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.

pokemon.name: salazzle
pokemon.dex: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.

pokemon.name: stufful
pokemon.dex: A touch from anyone except a known friend sends it into a surging frenzy. It's an incredibly dangerous Pokémon.

pokemon.name: bewear
pokemon.dex: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.

pokemon.name: bounsweet
pokemon.dex: Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird Pokémon are always after it, but it's not intelligent enough to care.

pokemon.name: steenee
pokemon.dex: It bounces around, swinging the sepals on its head with abandon. They're quite painful when they smack you!

pokemon.name: tsareena
pokemon.dex: A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.

pokemon.name: comfey
pokemon.dex: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.

pokemon.name: oranguru
pokemon.dex: It normally spends its time meditating in the treetops. It throws Poké Balls and gives other Pokémon orders as it pleases.

pokemon.name: passimian
pokemon.dex: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

pokemon.name: wimpod
pokemon.dex: It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.

pokemon.name: golisopod
pokemon.dex: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

pokemon.name: sandygast
pokemon.dex: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

pokemon.name: palossand
pokemon.dex: Buried beneath the castle are masses of dried-up bones from those whose vitality it has drained.

pokemon.name: pyukumuku
pokemon.dex: Its entire body is covered in its own slime. If you accidentally step on one, you'll slip, and it will get mad and smack you!

pokemon.name: type:-null
pokemon.dex: There's danger of its going on a rampage, so its true power is sealed away beneath its control mask.

pokemon.name: silvally
pokemon.dex: This is its form once it has awakened and evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is greatly increased.

pokemon.name: minior
pokemon.dex: Strong impacts can knock it out of its shell. This Pokémon was born from mutated nanoparticles.

pokemon.name: komala
pokemon.dex: It stays asleep from the moment it's born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.

pokemon.name: turtonator
pokemon.dex: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.

pokemon.name: togedemaru
pokemon.dex: Its capacity to produce electricity is somewhat limited, so it gets charged up by letting lightning strike it!

pokemon.name: mimikyu
pokemon.dex: A lonely Pokémon, it conceals its terrifying appearance beneath an old rag so it can get closer to people and other Pokémon.

pokemon.name: bruxish
pokemon.dex: It burrows beneath the sand, radiating psychic power from the protuberance on its head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.

pokemon.name: drampa
pokemon.dex: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

pokemon.name: dhelmise
pokemon.dex: It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks away their vitality. It only likes to go after big prey like Wailord.

pokemon.name: jangmo-o
pokemon.dex: It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.

pokemon.name: hakamo-o
pokemon.dex: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.

pokemon.name: kommo-o
pokemon.dex: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.

pokemon.name: tapu-koko
pokemon.dex: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.

pokemon.name: tapu-lele
pokemon.dex: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.

pokemon.name: tapu-bulu
pokemon.dex: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

pokemon.name: tapu-fini
pokemon.dex: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

pokemon.name: cosmog
pokemon.dex: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

pokemon.name: cosmoem
pokemon.dex: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.

pokemon.name: solgaleo
pokemon.dex: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.

pokemon.name: lunala
pokemon.dex: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.

pokemon.name: nihilego
pokemon.dex: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.

pokemon.name: buzzwole
pokemon.dex: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch.

pokemon.name: pheromosa
pokemon.dex: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.

pokemon.name: xurkitree
pokemon.dex: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity.

pokemon.name: celesteela
pokemon.dex: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.

pokemon.name: kartana
pokemon.dex: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.

pokemon.name: guzzlord
pokemon.dex: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.

pokemon.name: necrozma
pokemon.dex: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.

pokemon.name: magearna
pokemon.dex: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.

pokemon.name: marshadow
pokemon.dex: It lurks in the shadows of others, copying their movements and powers. This Pokémon is craven and cowering.

pokemon.name: poipole
pokemon.dex: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.

pokemon.name: naganadel
pokemon.dex: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

pokemon.name: stakataka
pokemon.dex: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.

pokemon.name: blacephalon
pokemon.dex: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents' surprise to rob them of their vitality.

pokemon.name: zeraora
pokemon.dex: It approaches its enemies at the speed of lightning, then tears them limb from limb with its sharp claws.

pokemon.name: meltan
pokemon.dex: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

pokemon.name: melmetal
pokemon.dex: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
